translations: n.凹，凹陷；凹面，凹性（concavity 的复数）

sentences.sentence: I wish I were your second derivative so I could fill your concavities.
sentences.translation: 我希望我是你的另一个衍生物，那么我就可以填充你的凹陷了。

sentences.sentence: The formation of these microcracks is closely related to local conditions of the Tusion line concavities.
sentences.translation: 熔合线凹入处的局部条件直接影响微裂纹的形成。

sentences.sentence: Conclusion: Root trunk concavities may cause furcation involvement and reduce the efficacy of periodontal therapy.
sentences.translation: 结论：根柱凹陷可能是造成根分叉病变的原因，并可能是导致牙周治疗效果欠佳的原因。
